name: Race! (crashie)
description:
i just wanted to test out how making a simple race game, then uploading it as a webgl game to itch :) i know it's not much, but it's my first prototype that i've ever uploaded :>

Controls:

WASD and Arrow Keys- To move left, right, forward, backwards

thats all :D

Models:

Models are using free car package with assets, the rest is made with unity primitives
